info.name: Dark Void ⊷ Minimalist Black Theme
info.description: Customizable color details! Default is blue but have a friendly advice in case you want to change it: choose the same color for all, it will be easier. Light colors look better, have fun! ↪Reblogged post & icon. ↪Opposite theme: Pale Void. ☁☁☁☁☁☁☁☁☁ ⇢Follow sugoi dashboards for more!

settings.label: Border between tags/options in menus (e.g. pop up menu of tags when you search for one)

Post controls background bubbles (like, reblog, etc...)
Hovered text in sidebar (posts, followers, etc...)
Recommended blogs titles (you can choose later if you want them visible or not)
